mappings.pain_point: Revenue leaders lack real-time pipeline visibility across 200-500 reps, causing forecast misses and unexpected revenue exposure.
mappings.value_proposition: Power BI and Tableau connectors export Asana data into executive dashboards, improving pipeline visibility and cutting forecast variance by up to 30%.

mappings.pain_point: Long 8-12 month sales cycles stall during handoffs between sales, product, and legal, reducing win rates and deal velocity.
mappings.value_proposition: Asana Work Management standardizes deal handoffs and action ownership, shortening stage durations and increasing win rates by ≈15%.

mappings.pain_point: New rep ramp is slow across regions, leaving territories undercovered and depressing quota attainment.
mappings.value_proposition: Asana Templates combined with AI Teammates automate ramp plans and task drafts, cutting time-to-productivity by ~25%.

mappings.pain_point: Forecasts rely on manual CRM updates and tribal knowledge, causing inaccurate projections and missed targets.
mappings.value_proposition: Asana AI surfaces blockers and auto-summarizes status into connected systems via Asana Integrations, reducing manual updates by ~60% and improving forecast accuracy.

mappings.pain_point: Cross-functional approvals for large deals create bottlenecks and hidden risks, delaying closes and increasing discounting.
mappings.value_proposition: AI Workflows codifies approval paths and automates escalations, cutting handoff delays by ~40% and reducing negotiation time.

mappings.pain_point: Data silos across Salesforce, Slack, and creative tools hide deal context, increasing time wasted on context-switching.
mappings.value_proposition: Asana Integrations sync tasks and attachments across tools, eliminating context-switches and saving reps 5–8 hours/week.

mappings.pain_point: Enterprise security needs slow access provisioning for sensitive deal data, blocking scaling of GTM operations.
mappings.value_proposition: Permissions Management enforces role-based access across projects, halving provisioning time and preserving secure scale.

personas_with_mappings.persona_name: US Enterprise Financial Services - Ops Leaders

mappings.pain_point: Ops leaders struggle to produce audit trails across distributed workflows, increasing compliance risk and audit effort.
mappings.value_proposition: Compliance Management captures immutable project histories and reports, producing audit-ready trails and cutting audit prep time by up to 70%.

mappings.pain_point: Manual approval routing across 100-300 distributors slows product rollouts, costing revenue and market responsiveness.
mappings.value_proposition: AI Workflows automates approval routing and compliance checks, accelerating product launches by ~30%.

mappings.pain_point: Fragmented task ownership causes missed submissions and chargebacks, increasing operational costs.
mappings.value_proposition: Asana Work Management centralizes tasks, SLAs, and ownership, reducing submission errors and chargebacks by ~25%.

mappings.pain_point: Ad hoc access control raises insider-risk and complicates regulator reviews, increasing remediation costs.
mappings.value_proposition: Permissions Management enforces granular access controls and simplifies attestations, cutting security incidents and audit prep by ~50%.

mappings.pain_point: Regulatory reporting requires manual pulls from multiple systems, delaying responses to regulators and boards.
mappings.value_proposition: Power BI and Tableau connectors push Asana data into regulator-ready dashboards, slashing report assembly time by ~80%.

mappings.pain_point: Ops teams repeat manual intake and approval tasks, wasting specialist time and extending SLAs.
mappings.value_proposition: AI Studio lets ops build tailored automations for intake and approvals, automating repeat work and saving 20+ hours/week across the team.

mappings.pain_point: Marketing VPs miss client campaign deadlines because creative handoffs are disjointed, hurting retention and revenue.
mappings.value_proposition: Asana Work Management coordinates campaign tasks and deadlines across teams, improving on-time delivery by ~35%.

mappings.pain_point: Creative contributors spend hours on briefs and status updates, reducing billable creative time.
mappings.value_proposition: AI Teammates drafts briefs and summarizes project status, saving contributors 3–6 hours/week.

mappings.pain_point: Repeated campaign setups slow launches across clients, increasing time-to-market and costs.
mappings.value_proposition: Asana Templates provide prebuilt campaign frameworks, cutting setup time by ~50% and enforcing best practices.

mappings.pain_point: Proofing and feedback are fragmented across Figma and Slack, causing rework and longer review cycles.
mappings.value_proposition: Asana Integrations sync proofs and comments from Figma and Slack into tasks, reducing review cycles by ~40%.

mappings.pain_point: CMOs lack consolidated ROI reporting across channels, complicating budget decisions and optimization.
mappings.value_proposition: Power BI and Tableau connectors export Asana outcomes to executive dashboards, enabling faster ROI reporting and improving budget allocation by ~20%.

personas_with_mappings.persona_name: UK Public Sector - Program Delivery Leaders

mappings.pain_point: Program leaders can't easily present transparent audit trails for multi-year programs, delaying approvals and funding.
mappings.value_proposition: Compliance Management captures project controls and histories to deliver audit-ready trails, reducing approval delays by ~60%.

mappings.pain_point: Procurement and stakeholder sign-offs create bottlenecks that push timelines and inflate program costs.
mappings.value_proposition: AI Workflows automates sign-off routing and escalation rules, cutting approval cycle times by ~40%.

mappings.pain_point: Distributed delivery teams lack a single source of truth for plans and budgets, causing duplicated work and overruns.
mappings.value_proposition: Asana Work Management centralizes plans, tasks, and budgets, reducing duplicated work and lowering program costs by ~15%.

mappings.pain_point: Preparing reports for ministers and boards is manual and slow, reducing responsiveness and stakeholder confidence.
mappings.value_proposition: Power BI and Tableau connectors produce executive-ready dashboards from Asana, slashing report prep time by ~70%.

mappings.pain_point: Strict external partner access rules complicate collaboration and security reviews, delaying partner onboarding.
mappings.value_proposition: Permissions Management enforces granular access controls for external collaborators, cutting security review cycles by ~50% while preserving collaboration.

personas_with_mappings.persona_name: Global Media & Entertainment - Creative Ops Leaders

mappings.pain_point: Creative ops faces long multi-region approval loops, delaying releases and ad/streaming revenue windows.
mappings.value_proposition: Asana Work Management standardizes review stages and owners, shortening approval loops and speeding releases by ~30%.

mappings.pain_point: Teams waste time finding the latest asset versions and history, causing rework and missed deadlines.
mappings.value_proposition: Asana Integrations sync files and versioning from Figma and Drive into tasks, cutting asset search and rework time by ~60%.

mappings.pain_point: Scaling production lacks repeatable processes, limiting throughput for campaigns and shows.
mappings.value_proposition: Asana Templates paired with AI Workflows create repeatable production frames, increasing throughput by ~25%.

mappings.pain_point: Creative leads spend hours drafting briefs and QA checklists, reducing time for high-value direction.
mappings.value_proposition: AI Teammates drafts briefs and QA checklists on demand, saving leads 4+ hours/week and accelerating reviews.

mappings.pain_point: Global teams suffer meeting overload to coordinate across time zones, cutting creative time.
mappings.value_proposition: Asana Work Management clarifies asynchronous handoffs and task ownership, cutting recurring status meetings by ~50%.

mappings.pain_point: Revenue cycle leaders face long denial resolution times, reducing cash flow and increasing days sales outstanding (DSO).
mappings.value_proposition: AI Workflows automates denial routing and task assignment, reducing denial resolution time by up to ~40% and accelerating cash recovery.

mappings.pain_point: Manual claims tracking and follow-ups cause missed deadlines and revenue leakage.
mappings.value_proposition: Asana Work Management centralizes claim workflows, SLAs, and escalations, improving on-time filing and reducing leakage by ~20%.

mappings.pain_point: PHI-related compliance and audit trails are heavy and error-prone, exposing regulatory risk and fines.
mappings.value_proposition: Compliance Management provides audit trails and controls for PHI workflows, simplifying audits and cutting compliance effort by ~60%.

mappings.pain_point: Inconsistent role access to billing tasks increases insider-risk and lengthens audit responses.
mappings.value_proposition: Permissions Management enforces role-based access across billing projects, reducing access incidents and speeding audits by ~50%.

mappings.pain_point: Finance lacks consolidated denial and AR aging reporting, delaying operational decisions.
mappings.value_proposition: Power BI and Tableau connectors feed Asana data into AR dashboards, reducing report prep time by ~80% and accelerating decision-making.
